title: Site Access Issues
body:
Getting dns issues when trying to log in or view this page...

https://auth.riotgames.com/authorize?client_id=rso-web-client-prod&redirect_uri=https%3A%2F%2Flogin.leagueoflegends.com%2Foauth2-callback&scope=openid&response_type=code&state=CWHZs2nj0STUu7i6TaeTNIKG08bkLD9yyQAqxlq1w1M&ui_locales=en-au&login_hint=oce

Had to post this via my phone. I'm also having random latency issues. But would like to sort this out first. 

http://s33.postimg.org/6pbws00hb/20160526_191150.jpg

replies.body:
Hey, 

Thanks for the advice. Have swapped to public DNS, now works. Seems to be better! Thanks!

Hey,

Glad to hear all is well now :)

In the future when using the boards and replying to someone, remember to use the "Reply" button under the post you're replying to, we receive notifications then.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Too add to what SephirothSG has said. Make sure you haven't changed your DNS settings to use a VPN.

Hey there,

Are you still experiencing this?

Could you try [switching to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5) for me, let me know if this helps.
